content: I think I'll choose a mix of records that reflect my personal taste in music and photography. I'll select a few albums from the 1990s, like Nirvana's "Nevermind" and Radiohead's "OK Computer", as well as some classic rock albums with iconic cover art, like Pink Floyd's "Dark Side of the Moon" and The Beatles' "Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band". I'll also include some jazz and blues records, like Miles Davis' "Kind of Blue" and Robert Johnson's "King of the Delta Blues Singers", to add some diversity to the selection. To tie everything together, I'll choose records with camera-inspired artwork or photography-themed covers, like The Clash's "London Calling" or The Rolling Stones' "Exile on Main St.".
